cannabisPriorityStatus.socialEquityRequirements:
* []{cannabis-social-equity-notarized-statement}A [notarized statement or attestation](https://www.nj.gov/cannabis/documents/businesses/personal-use/Certification%20of%20SEB%20FINAL%2012.13.21.pdf) by the owner(s) that they meet the criteria for a `Social Equity Business|social-equity-business-cannabis` 
* \[]{cannabis-social-equity-residency-doc}Documentation to prove income (such as tax return), residency (such as mortgage statements or bills), and any records related to past cannabis charges, if applicable
cannabisPriorityStatus.noPriorityStatusText: Based on your answers, you are not eligible for any priority status. You can mark this task as completed.
cannabisPriorityStatus.greenBoxSocialEquityText: A completed Social Equity Business form
cannabisPriorityStatus.secondTabDescriptionText: You qualify for the following priority statuses. If you qualify for more than one priority status, your application will be reviewed and approved according to the highest level of priority: Social Equity Business, Diversely-Owned Business, and Impact Zone Business.
cannabisPriorityStatus.minorityWomenOwnedRequirements:
- []{general-minority-and-women-owned-owner-names}Names and addresses of the owner, partners, or shareholders, as applicable, and their representative shares of ownership
- []{general-minority-and-women-owned-officer-names}Names and addresses of the officers of the business
- []{general-minority-and-women-owned-bod-names}Names and addresses of members of the board of directors (c-corps only)
- []{general-minority-and-women-owned-shares}Number of shares of stock issued and outstanding (c-corps only)
- []{general-minority-and-women-owned-agreements}Articles of incorporation, bylaws, partnership agreements, or joint venture agreements (as applicable)
- []{general-minority-and-women-charts}Organizational charts
- []{general-minority-and-women-identification}Applicant's certificate of birth, or motor vehicle driver's license, passport, or other acceptable form of identification
- []{general-minority-and-women-affidavit}An affidavit, signed by the individual seeking certification, certifying that the applicant is a minority business or women's business
cannabisPriorityStatus.veteranOwnedRequirements:
- \[]{general-veteran-honorable-discharge}Federal Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Business Determination Letter, Disability Award Letter or Federal Service-Disabled Veteran Letter. (Must be provided for majority owners).
- \[]{general-veteran-nj-residency}Proof of New Jersey residency for majority owner(s)
cannabisPriorityStatus.veteranHeaderText: Diversely-Owned Business: Disabled Veteran-Owned Business (DVOB) Certification
cannabisPriorityStatus.minorityOrWomenHeaderText: Diversely-Owned Business: Minority or Women-Owned Business Enterprise (M/WBE) Certification
cannabisPriorityStatus.impactZoneText: Nothing else to do here. Youâ€™re ready to start applying for your cannabis license.
